questions.question: 'IN SOME PARTS OF THE WORLD, CARROTS ARE ROASTED, GROUND & USED AS A SUBSTITUTE FOR THIS, LIKE CHICORY'

____ FLOYD'

____ ____ CHILI PEPPERS'

____ ____ CULT'

SQ'

LTMTM'

NM'

B'

BLVS'

final-jeopardy.question: 'THIS WORD REGARDING INFIDELITY CAME FROM A CERTAIN BIRD LEAVING ITS EGGS IN OTHER NESTS TO BE RAISED'
